name: testLogInWithDeletedUserCredentials
description: Checking the error message display when logging in with a remote user
descriptionHtml: Checking the error message display when logging in with a remote user

testStage.description: Checking the error message display when logging in with a remote user

steps.name: click 'Manage Jenkins' link from Main page
Click Manage Users on ManageJenkins Page
Click 'Logo' button and move to main page
click 'Manage Jenkins' link from Main page
Click Manage Users on ManageJenkins Page
Click on the 'Yes' button on the DeletePage
input user name 'testuser' in the input field on Login Page
input password 'p@ssword123' in the input field on Login Page
Click 'Sign in' button on Login Page
Get message 'Incorrect username or password' on Login Page
Logout from instance http://localhost:8080/
